longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.
Admission and Transit Restrictions:
- Admission refused to holders of non-biometric passports
  issued to nationals of Montenegro.

Visa required, except for Nationals of Montenegro. (SEE NOTE
56865)
    NOTE 56865: Not applicable to holders of emergency
   passports, who require a visa.
Minors:
- Minors  
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds (in
  hard currency) to cover their stay and documents required
  for their next destination.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
